node.html: Egresado de Psicología, en la Universidad de Huánuco, en busca de emocionantes oportunidades de trabajo a tiempo completo.

Tengo más de 10 años de experiencia en los campos de Administración y HelpDesk. Mi objetivo es participar en el apoyo adminsitrativo en el despliege de software creando acontacto directo con los usuarios, además de no estar limitado a unas pocas pilas de tecnología.

Después de graduarme de Universidad de Huánuco, Planeo unirme a un sólido equipo visionario que trabaja en una amplia variedad de proyectos desafiantes e interesantes con diferentes tecnologías.

And, Yo soy un Guitarrista de hobby ;)

Aquí hay algunas tecnologías con las que he estado trabajando recientemente.:

• Psicología Clínica / 4
  • El psicólogo graduado realiza diagnósticos psicológicos desde una actitud ética y responsable. Utiliza las pruebas y herramientas psicológicas pertinentes para evaluar a un individuo, o grupo en el campo clínico.
• Coursework : Data Structures, Algorithms, Software Engineering, Object Oriented Programming, Distributed Operating System

Technologies: React.js, Python, GRPC, WebRTC, Docker

  • Building software tools in React.js and Python with Machine Learning Engineers to accelerate production‑grade Conversational AI use cases in Docker Container over GCP cluster
  • Using Flask based routing methods to trigger underlying capabilities of NVIDIA’s end‑to‑end ML framework and Socket+GRPC for live audio transcription

Technologies: Java, Javascript, Python, Elastic Search

  • Working on a project ”RadSearch” under the supervision of Prof. I.V. Ramakrishnan, a Search Engine used regularly by the doctors at the Radiology Department of the Stony Brook Hospital to find the most relevant information about patients
  • Created a distributed, multitenant-capable full-text search engine with an HTTP web interface and schema-free JSON documents using Elastic Search to handle user queries and Java Servlets, Python, Javascript to handle the backend

• Assisted Prof. Dimitris Samaras in teaching Course CSE327-01: Computer Vision
  • Managed assignment formulations and assessments, and resolve queries of students enrolled in the course

Technologies: AWS Cloud, Python, Node.js, Spark

  • Developed an end to end files sync system able to upload the VR content on the cloud, sync with local file system, and play on cross-platform desktop application over globally separated clients; using Electron.js, AWS services (Lambda, S3, MQTT), and React.js
  • Implemented software system to semi-automate Company’s marketing work with Chrome Extension and REST API Web backend using Python and Node.js, efficient in reducing ∼ 40 % of Marketing team’s manual work
  • Designed and automated ETL jobs to work on a huge realtime data of US Schools using AWS services (Glue, Lambda, S3) and Spark

Technologies: Python, Keras, Deep Learning, Numpy, OpenCV

  • Designed generalized Convolutional Neural Network architecture to handle multimodal and/or multispectral imagery along with adaptability to varying application requirements; trained on Potsdam benchmark dataset producing State of the art results to Semantic Segmentation
  • Built software tools in Python for data preparation/processing of geographic remote sensing data, visualization, real-time training performance evaluation, post-processing and output generation as a semi-automation approach
  • Manipulated raster GIS data as a part of the pre-processing task using Python and QGIS application

• Analysis on secondary factors contributing to child mortality using Big Data Techniques, under supervision of Prof. Andrew Schwartz.
  • Implemented Linear Regression and Similarity Search running on women lifestyle real data distributed on Hadoop clusters

• Trained & executed a Deep Neural Network on Overhead Images having Gaussian Noise, achieving 90% accuracy with computational efficiency and ability to generalize well despite limited training data of Worldview Imagery samples provided by DigitalGlobe

• Analysis on a market basket dataset to provide insights to help the company with business by finding reasons for drop in sales, under Supervision of Prof. Steven Skiena.
  • Implemented Word2Vec and LSTM model with k-means clustering to improve Shelf Space Management and Inventory management.

Fine-tuned a CNN to super-resolve Multispectral Satelite Imagery to Panchromatic Resolution, with a high performance delivery in terms of reduced resolution quantitative assessment and visual inspection; Achieved better results compared to popular methods used for this purpose in the industry

Built an application for data preparation/processing of geographic remote sensing data, visualization, real-time training performance evaluation, post-processing and output generation as a semi-automation approach along with a self-designed CNN architecture to handle multimodal and/or multispectral imagery along with adaptability to varying application requirements

• Analysed Covid's impact using a Covid dataset and an associated (non-covid) dataset, instructed by Prof. Anshul Gandhi.
  • Performed AR, EWMA, Wald's test, Z-test, t-test, K-S test, permutation test, correlation, and Bayesian inference along with suitable visualizations
• A web-based software for employees of a Software Company to send/receive messages, share files in person, groups and broadcast channels with various administrative permission roles
• Built cross-platform application to fully synchronize local storage and AWS S3 storage

• A search engine implemented using Apache Solr PageRank, and Lucene algorithms.
  • It crawls web and gathers data and indexes the webpages using Apache Tika parser with advanced features like spell checking, autocompletion and generation of snippets for improving result display
• Implemented and trained a CNN architecture based on U-net for segmentation using pretrained weights of VGG16 to participate in a Kaggle Competition

• A system to suggest movies based on a user's interests using MovieLens dataset
  • Implemented SVM and Fully Connected Neural Network
Let's discuss problems and find optimum solutions. Feel free to reach out.
